attributes.action: admit that the goverment has jumped on the environmental/CO2 bandwagon, before any link to global warming has been proved, in order to raise tax and is not actually concerned about the environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The so called Green Taxes are killing this country and will have absolutely no effect on the environment, as any 'global warming' phenomenon is driven by the Sun, not industry or cars. This goverment are taxing people unfairly, to force them to reduce their reliance on private motor vehicles, when there is no suitable alternative.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
